definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: The Altamira Cave consists of a series of rooms and passages shaped like anS.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾塔米拉洞包括的一系列房間和塑造象像S型。

sentences.english: Mila Kolesnikova is a Moscow actress and photo journalist.
sentences.chinese: 米拉，莫斯科的演員和攝影記者。

sentences.english: I am Mira from the Pleiadian high council.
sentences.chinese: 我是來自昴宿星高級議會的米拉。

sentences.english: Casa Andina Select Miraflores is the ideal luxury Lima hotel choice.
sentences.chinese: 安第斯選擇米拉弗洛雷斯是理想選擇利馬豪華酒店。

sentences.english: The sons of Levi； Gershom， Kohath， and Merari.
sentences.chinese: 利未的兒子是革順，哥轄，米拉利。

sentences.english: And these were the sons of Levi by their names; Gershon, and Kohath, and Merari.
sentences.chinese: 利未衆子的名字是革順，哥轄，米拉利。

sentences.english: Pamela fingered the pearl choker around her thin throat.
sentences.chinese: 帕米拉擺弄一下緊圍在她細脖子上的珍珠項鍊。

sentences.english: Milagros has a deformed left kidney and a very small right one located very low in her body.
sentences.chinese: 米拉格羅斯的左腎畸形，右腎很小，位於身體的下方。

sentences.english: Semiramis had all of the parts gathered, except for one part that could not be found.
sentences.chinese: 塞米拉米將所有部件收集，除了一部分不被找到。

sentences.english: The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath and Merari.
sentences.chinese: 利未的兒子是革順，哥轄，米拉利。

sentences.english: Welcome to the History, welcome at the San Domenico Palace in Taormina.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎回到歷史，歡迎來到陶爾米拉的聖多梅尼科教堂。

sentences.english: These are the divisions of the porters among the sons of Kore, and among the sons of Merari.
sentences.chinese: 以上是可拉子孫和米拉利子孫守門的班次。

sentences.english: Also Camilla got her foot hurt during holiday in this month.
sentences.chinese: 這個月卡米拉在度假的時候腳又受傷了。

sentences.english: That night Romilayu's praying was more fervent than ever.
sentences.chinese: 當天晚上，羅米拉尤的禱告比以往更加虔誠。
